biotools.summary: DM3Loc is a web tool for multi-label mRNA subcellular localization prediction and analysis based on multi-head self-attention mechanism. DM3Loc is a novel Deep-learning framework with multi-head self-attention for multi-label mRNA subcellular localization prediction and analyses, which provide prediciton for six subcellular compartments, including nucleus, exosome, cytoplasm, ribosome, membrane, and endoplasmic reticulum.
